tips: Help us maintain a respectful community by reporting inappropriate quotes using '/reportquote'.
Customize your experience by setting your preferred language with '/setlanguage (SOON)'.
Challenge yourself and others with our Quote Trivia feature!
Find out which quote categories are trending with '/popularcategory'.
Keep your quote streak alive by interacting with the bot each day!
Confirm your agreement to our Terms of Service to enhance your user experience. (SOON)
Send a random database quote by using '/sendquote'.
Improve your ranking on the Quote Leaderboard by adding high-quality quotes!
Engage with the community by rating quotes with '/ratequote'.
View important messages by the developers with '/notices'.
Join our Discord server for quote discussions and bot support!
Earn badges by consistently adding high-quality quotes!
Use '/suggestfeature' to propose new ideas for the bot.
